name: SearchFieldPlacement
desc: A structure which defines the placement of a search field in a view hierarchy.

items.name: struct NavigationBarDrawerDisplayMode
items.desc: A structure that defines the display behavior of a search field when in the navigation bar drawer.

items.name: static let automatic: SearchFieldPlacement
items.desc: The search field is placed automatically depending on the platform.

items.name: static let navigationBarDrawer: SearchFieldPlacement
items.desc: The search field is placed in an drawer of the navigation bar.

items.name: static let sidebar: SearchFieldPlacement
items.desc: The search field is placed in the sidebar of a navigation view.

items.name: static let toolbar: SearchFieldPlacement
items.desc: The search field is placed in the toolbar.

items.name: static func navigationBarDrawer(displayMode: SearchFieldPlacement.NavigationBarDrawerDisplayMode) -> SearchFieldPlacement
items.desc: The search field is placed in an drawer of the navigation bar.
